name: Jump!
description:
Ever want that nostalgic Mario feel again? Well now you can! With jump! This game is a short jumper game. This is my first game, I would love feedback for my next game!

If you hit the front of back of a turtle you restart the game, but you can jump on top of them, if you get hit by three arrows you have to restart the level

W and D for forward and backward and there is space for jump
